text: The 2008-09 Austrian football championship was the 98th season of the top league in Austria. FC Red Bull Salzburg won the 5th title and the 2nd since the Red Bull take over. Starting this season, the sponsor name of the Bundesliga changed from T-Mobile Bundesliga to tipp3-Bundesliga powered by T-Mobile. The Austrian sports betting provider tipp3 replaced T-Mobile as the new main sponsor. The mobile phone company remained as a subsponsor of the Bundesliga. ==Mode == In the 2008/09 season, as in previous years, ten clubs competed against each other in a total of 36 rounds. Each team played twice at home and twice away against each of the nine other teams. the ten teams played for three international starting places, one Champions League place and two Europa League places. ==Final table== Pl.
